sources.title: Await The Dawn | Full Movie | Action Horror | Dee Wallace | Courtney Gains
sources.description:
Await the Dawn - A troubled family traveling cross country are highjacked by a desperate man. Only to discover he's running from something more dangerous than he is.

metadata.Plot: Annie (Dee Wallace) a desperate mother is traveling cross country with her family to seek professional treatment for her daughter's drug addiction. Their plans are quickly derailed as Howard (Josh Server), a desperate man with a terrible secret, ambushes their RV at gunpoint. With little to no reason given, he instructs them to transport him as far away as possible. However, they are quickly cut off by a mysterious 9 year old girl. She may seem like a sweet all American girl, but deep inside, she harbors an immense otherworldly evil. The troubled family must now put their trust in their captor, as they try to survive the night...and Await the Dawn.
metadata.Actors: Courtney Gains, Dee Wallace, Vernon Wells
